data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Daegu, South Korea to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Daegu, South Korea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Daegu, South Korea to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 413,520 believers in the state of Daegu the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, convict the 413,520 believers in Daegu to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, remember the Thai people. Make the Thai people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide seekers in Daegu, South Korea to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 413,520 believers in Daegu to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,114,079 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the state of Daegu, South Korea has a population of 2,527,600.

We estimate Daegu has 413,520 people who might know Jesus, 347,325 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,766,754 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 413,520 believers in the state of Daegu into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;
